translation.en: -Joel. -Shh. No words, my love.
I'm sorry, babe, I'm just not really a "pound one out" kind of gal.
translation.ko: 미안한데 난 아무 때나 쉽게 대 주는 여자 아니야

translation.en: I know, and that's great.
You like romance and lavender candles
and a massage with essential oils and a wonderful meal but not too heavy.
translation.ko: 로맨틱한 여자잖아 향초에다 오일 마사지 근사한 식사를 좋아하지 단, 양은 적게

translation.en: You're making fun of me.
No. I'm only saying that sometimes, maybe even now,
translation.ko: 내 말은 그게 아니라 가끔은 이렇게

translation.en: -we might try... -Humping?
Like that rescue dog did to that little girl at the Rite Aid?
[woman] Jennifer Lawrence chopped off her hair again.
translation.ko: 제니퍼 로런스가 머리를 또 싹둑 잘랐어

translation.en: Everybody hates it like that but she doesn't care.
translation.ko: 여자들은 그런 거 질색하는데 걔는 아랑곳 안 해

translation.en: She's so bold.
I wish I was bold.
Am I bold? No, I'm not.
translation.ko: 나 좀 세? 아냐, 쨉도 안 되지

translation.en: I'm really upset about the new toaster oven.
translation.ko: 새로 산 오븐 토스터 진짜 짜증 나

translation.en: I'd like to be 20 percent bolder.
No, more, 80 percent. No, that's too much.
translation.ko: 아냐, 좀 더! 80%면 좋겠다 너무 갔나?

translation.en: Look at all the slack in these knobs.
You can't set an accurate temperature.
Yeah, I know, honey. Did you send them an e-mail?
No, I re-read it. It came across a little crazy.
translation.ko: 아니, 다시 읽어 보니까 좀 정신 나간 소리 같더라고

translation.en: Well...
I need a car.
I can't live here anymore without a car. We're in the middle of freaking nowhere.
translation.ko: 차 없인 못 살겠어 여긴 외딴 동네잖아

translation.en: -We're not buying you a car. -You don't need to buy me a car.
translation.ko: 안 사 줘 나한텐 안 사 줘도 돼

translation.en: Buy Mom a new car, I'll take hers. Like a normal family.
translation.ko: 엄마한테 사 주면 다른 애들처럼 엄마 차 쓸게

translation.en: -I like the Range Rover. -Ah.
You'd look good in that.
Why don't you love Mom enough to buy her a Range Rover?
translation.ko: 엄마를 진짜 사랑하면 레인지 로버쯤은 껌이잖아

translation.en: -[groans] Ow. -Well...
What? What is it? Are you all right?
Yeah, I just have this, like, sharp... [groans]
Here, sit down.
Is Mom dying?
-Stop it. -I don't know, parents die.
I'm not dying, honey. I probably just ate something.
translation.ko: 죽긴 누가 죽어? 뭘 잘못 먹었나 봐

translation.en: [sharp breath] I'm fine. See? All better.
-Are you sure? You scared me. -Yeah, me too.
Makes you think... life is short.
You're not getting a car.
Maybe we can hang out after school.
Go to the Tea Garden together.
Why?
Because I love you and I don't see you very much.
translation.ko: 이 엄만 널 사랑하는데 자주 못 보니까

translation.en: -I think this is working. -[car trunk opens]
-Joel. -Dan.
Noticed a light on in your den all night.
Oh, okay. Someone's gonna get in trouble. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 아, 그랬군 누군 이제 큰일 났네!

translation.en: Just kidding, no one's in trouble.
-Unusual, that's all. -Dan.
-I had trouble sleeping, so I was up. -You had trouble sleeping?
translation.ko: 불면증 때문에 제가 깨어 있었어요 자기 불면증 있어?

translation.en: -Problem? -Dan, leave people alone.
translation.ko: - 문제 있어? - 여보, 그만 좀 해

translation.en: -Cop brain, sorry. -I'm not a cop, baby.
translation.ko: 이놈의 경찰 직감, 미안해요 경찰 아니야 LA 카운티 보안관서 소속이지

translation.en: -LA Sheriff's Department, all the way. -Mm-hmm.
translation.ko: 경찰 아니야 LA 카운티 보안관서 소속이지

translation.en: Dickless over there is a cop. Morning, puss.
translation.ko: 저 찌질이가 경찰이잖아 잘 잤나, 약골!

translation.en: Another day in pretend law enforcement?
translation.ko: 법 집행관 행세 할 날이 또 밝았네

translation.en: Have a good day, Dan. Be safe.
Santa Monica PD. Shitbirds. [scoffs]
Be careful today chasing bad guys, honey bunch.
Oh, that's right, they don't allow pursuits in Santa Monica.
Worried it might hurt somebody's feelings.
-Just trying not to kill civilians, Dan. -[baby coos]
We protect and serve, not frame and maim like the sheriff's department.
translation.ko: 음모나 꾸미고 멀쩡한 사람 잡는 건 자네 부서잖아

translation.en: -Suck me, Rick. -[chuckles]
Joel, Sheila.
Why do we gotta live between two cops?
Why couldn't it be two rival pastry chefs?
-I don't know. -See you at the Petersons'.
Do you have everything you need?
-[Abby] Yes, Mom. -I'm just checking.
-Bye, Dad. -Bye, honey.
Abby.
-You look so pretty today. -[chuckles]
Eric worships you. You're the queen of his spank bank.
translation.ko: 에릭이 너 짝사랑하잖아 딸딸이 칠 때 너만 생각할걸

translation.en: Mom, please!
Hey, some of us girls are going out tonight.
translation.ko: 있잖아 여자들끼리 밤에 놀러 나갈 거야

translation.en: Drinking, dancing, etcetera. You wanna come?
No, I can't, um, tonight.
translation.ko: 아니, 오늘은 안 돼 초대는 고마워

translation.en: -But thank you. -You're so flustered.
translation.ko: 아니, 오늘은 안 돼 초대는 고마워 긴장하긴 누가 바람이라도 피우재?

translation.en: We're not banging dudes.
At least that's what we tell our husbands.
You're funny. Have a nice day.
Sheila Hammond, say hello to Gary West.
translation.ko: 쉴라 해먼드 게리 웨스트 씨와 인사하지

translation.en: Gary was rocking it up in Sacramento. Now he's all ours.
translation.ko: 새크라멘토에서 잘나가던 인재인데 이제 우리 자산이야

translation.en: -Hi, Gary. Uh, welcome aboard. -Thank you, Sheila.
I'm very excited to be here.
Sheila works with her husband. She's the pretty one.
You two gonna sell the Peterson house today?
translation.ko: 오늘 피터슨 씨 집 팔 수 있겠어?

translation.en: We're gonna try, Carl.
None of this "try" bullshit. Do it!
Oh, you're yelling at me.
The Petersons are nervous. We cannot lose this goddamn listing.
translation.ko: 피터슨 댁에서 불안해해 이 계약은 꼭 따내야 한다고!

translation.en: Well, this is the third time these buyers have been at the house.
translation.ko: 집 보러 오는 것만 벌써 세 번째라잖아요

translation.en: -Get an offer! -Mm-hmm.
Get an offer.
-That's what realtors do. -Okay.
Come on, I'll show you your office. It's small.
translation.ko: 사무실 보여 줄 테니 따라오게 작긴 하네만

translation.en: It's nice meeting you. I'm so sorry you got yelled at.
Same. I mean, nice meeting you, not sorry I got yelled at.
-Well, actually both. -[laughs]
The master has been completely remodeled.
Lots of light and brand-new textured plush carpeting.
translation.ko: 자연광도 충분히 들어오고 플러시 카펫도 새로 깔았어요

translation.en: -All headed in the same direction. -[all chuckle]
It's just lovely.
Do you know what my favorite thing about the upstairs is?
translation.ko: 제 맘에 쏙 드는 게 위층에 있는데, 뭔지 아세요?

translation.en: -The laundry chute. -Oh, it's amazing.
It was so--
-[muffled gasp] -Oh, my God.
[Joel] Honey, you okay?
I'm sorry. We are gonna call a crew and immediately get that cleaned up.
Maybe we should reschedule.
translation.ko: 방문 일정을 다시 잡는 게 어때?

translation.en: Great idea. I could run you up to that Cape Cod on Barnhill.
translation.ko: 그게 좋겠어요 다른 집 보여 드릴게요

translation.en: No, please. I don't wanna make everyone have to come back.
translation.ko: - 가시죠 - 안 돼요 번거롭게 다시 방문하시지 말고

translation.en: I'm just gonna go use the restroom really quickly,
and call the cleaning crew.
I'll be right back, excuse me.
-Okay, other bedrooms. -Yes, this way.
New skylights really open it up, don't you think?
translation.ko: 새로 낸 천창 덕에 참 넓어 보이죠?

translation.en: -I love the crown molding in here. -Mmm.
translation.ko: 전 크라운 몰딩이 참 맘에 들어요

translation.en: -Just beautiful. -Yeah.
I wanna leave.
Sheila.
-[knocking] -Sheila-- Oh, my God.
Oh, my God, Sheila.
Sheila. Sheila? Sheila.
Oh, God.
Oh, God.
Oh, God, oh, God, oh, God.
Oh! Sheila.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
-Did we get the offer? -[gasps] Oh, what the fuck?
I'm okay.
I just threw up.
Like a fair amount.
Yeah.
And that came out of me.
Do you think it's an organ?
I really am feeling better, honey.
I wanna get you looked at.
[sighs] We've been here over three hours.
I just wanna go home, get out of these clothes and take a bath.
translation.ko: 집에 가서 냄새나는 옷 벗고 목욕하고 싶다고

translation.en: I feel like a bus station shit in my mouth.
[pats his thigh] I'll go see what's happening.
Excuse me.
Do not ask me again how long it's gonna be.
This isn't a deli counter.
The most life-threatening conditions have priority. Your wife threw up.
translation.ko: 생사 오락가락하는 환자들이 최우선인데 - 아내분은 토만 했잖아요 - 말도 못 하게요

translation.en: -A lot. -Your wife threw up.
translation.ko: - 아내분은 토만 했잖아요 - 말도 못 하게요 토 좀 했을 뿐이죠

translation.en: -A lot. -Okay, we're not doing this.
Gonna call your doctor and make you some soup.
You lost a lot of fluids.
I'm okay with you smoking pot.
Excuse me?
I know I complain about it so you try to hide it,
but I just want you to be the Joel you want to be.
-That's... -[vehicle approaching]
-That's really nice, sweetheart. -[door opens]
-Sheila. -Gary.
This is Gary, the new realtor I was telling you about.
Gary, my husband, Joel.
-Hey, Gary. -Hi there.
So how are you feeling? I heard about your afternoon.
-Much better, thank you. -Oh, these are for you.
translation.ko: 훨씬 나아요, 고맙네요 이거 받아요 청소업체는 제가 불렀어요

translation.en: And I made sure the cleaning crew got in there okay.
They took care of everything so don't worry about that.
-Thank you, Gary. That is so sweet. -So sweet.
translation.ko: 고마워요, 게리 정말 친절하시네요 친절하시기도 해라

translation.en: Well, we'd invite you in, but--
Don't even think about it. But listen-- Joel, can I talk to you a moment?
translation.ko: 그럴 필요 없어요 조엘, 얘기 좀 할까요?

translation.en: I'm gonna go get cleaned up.
Thanks for the flowers, Gar, and all your help.
No problem.
Feel better.
That was a crazy amount of vomit.
Well, I'm not a medical expert, so I can't say what the proper amount of vomit is.
translation.ko: 전 의사가 아니라서 적정량이 얼마인지 모르겠네요

translation.en: -It was a huge amount. -Are you a doctor, Gary?
-No. -Neither am I.
So let's not dishonor that profession,
translation.ko: 그러니까 의사를 너무 쉽게 보지 말자고요

translation.en: which takes eight years of intense training,
by thinking we can give medical opinions, okay?
Fine, then let's just stick to facts.
The homeowners came by, they didn't like what they saw.
So they don't want to work with you anymore. They'll be working with me now.
translation.ko: 당신들한테 못 맡긴다고 하셔서 제가 진행하기로 했죠

translation.en: You're stealing our listing?
No, the facts are they fired you, then hired me.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 사실대로 말하자면 당신들 해고하고 날 고용한 거죠

translation.en: And that was an insane amount of vomit.
Everything's good. Gary just needed some advice.
I helped him out.
I can't feel my heartbeat.
-What? -My heart.
I can't feel it.
[sighs] I love your hair.
Yeah. Like that.
Bingo. [exhales]
-Can I help you? -What?
My manager noticed that you've been staring at the stethoscopes
for, like, a really long time.
There's something happening with my wife.
Oh, well, I'm only 20, so...
Right. Sorry.
Do you know the difference between the dual-headed stethoscopes and the single-headed ones?
translation.ko: 듀얼 헤드 청진기와 싱글 헤드의 차이는 뭔가요?

translation.en: Well, dual would be two.
I see. So twice as many then.
It's not just a physical thing, she's acting different.
I'm gonna get this one.
It doesn't make sense.
My jaw still kinda hurts.
Then stop talking.
I don't hear anything.
-[Joel] I know, right? -There's something else.
translation.ko: - 내 말 맞지? - 다른 것도 보여 줄게

translation.en: But no one freak out because I feel fine.
translation.ko: 대신 겁먹지 마 난 아무렇지 않으니까

translation.en: Look. No blood.
Still, no one freak out.
Oh, shit.
-[Sheila] Is the juice helping? -Uh-huh.
[Joel] I can cook that meat for you, sweetheart.
I'm fine.
-We should go back to the emergency room. -No.
translation.ko: 응급실로 다시 가는 게 좋겠어 싫어

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Look, I know things are very wrong but I feel good.
translation.ko: 뭔가 잘못된 건 아는데 기분이 너무 좋아

translation.en: I have all this energy and, like, a focus.
I can't go to a hospital where they're gonna put me in a tube
translation.ko: 병원엔 못 가 날 시험관에 가두고 찔러댈 텐데

translation.en: and prick me and poke me.
They might never let me come home again.
Bad for you because we're having spectacular sex.
translation.ko: 그럼 당신 손해지! 화끈한 섹스와 영영 이별이잖아

translation.en: Whatever this is, we need to talk to someone because we are not experts.
translation.ko: 무슨 병인지 몰라도 조언을 좀 구해야 해 이쪽 방면은 아는 게 없잖아

translation.en: And this is just the sort of thing
the Internet will have a lot of misinformation about.
translation.ko: 이런 건 인터넷 찾아봐도 잘못된 정보가 엄청날 거야

translation.en: -[Abby] I know someone. -Who?
-A creeper. -What's a creeper?
The kind of a nerd who specializes in disturbing, weird or gruesome shit.
translation.ko: 엽기적이고 이상하고 섬뜩한 일에 빠삭한 덕후

translation.en: No pupillary response.
Have you noticed any deteriorating flesh?
-No? -Blackening of the skin,
translation.ko: - 살이 썩는 것 같아요? - 아니 피부가 검어지거나 떨어져 나가진 않고요?

translation.en: digits or other pieces falling off?
-No. -Okay.
-Um, have you eaten anyone? -No.
-But I may have thrown up an organ. -No worries.
translation.ko: 장기를 토한 것 같긴 해 그건 걱정 마세요

translation.en: -[slurring] Hello. -We already said hello.
From when you came in.
I haven't had this many people in my room before.
translation.ko: 내 방이 이렇게 바글댄 적이 없어서

translation.en: -You're doing fine. -Thank you.
Do you guys want chairs?
-We just want to know what's going on. -Right.
translation.ko: 무슨 증상인지 알기만 하면 좋겠어 그렇죠

translation.en: Well... she is dead...
-and also undead. -What the fuck?
translation.ko: 죽지 않은 상태기도 해요 뭔 개소리야?

translation.en: I'm sorry. What are you saying?
She's a... zombie?
I don't like that word, I think it's inherently negative.
translation.ko: 전 그 단어 싫어요 너무 부정적이거든요

translation.en: -I don't like it either. -Let's not use it.
I don't feel dead and undead.
translation.ko: 죽었다거나 안 죽었다거나 그런 기분은 안 드는걸

translation.en: I feel the opposite. Totally alive.
She's been very...
-exuberant. -Exuberant?
Yeah, they're doing it a lot.
Okay.
Well, one thing we know about the undead is they're completely driven by their id.
translation.ko: '언데드'의 특징은 철저히 본능에 따라 움직이는 거예요

translation.en: The id is a part of the brain that demands us to satisfy our desires.
translation.ko: 두뇌의 일부에서 욕망을 충족하라는 명령을 내리거든

translation.en: -I know what the id is. -It just...
-wants whatever it wants. -I sit behind you in Psych.
translation.ko: 본능대로 원할 뿐이지 심리학 시간에 네 뒤에 앉아

translation.en: -I know. -How could this happen?
translation.ko: 나도 알아 왜 이런 일이 생기지?

translation.en: We're realtors.
Well, most new viruses come from animals, like monkeys or bats.
translation.ko: 보통 새로운 바이러스는 동물을 통해 감염되죠 원숭이나 박쥐처럼요

translation.en: As humans destroy their habitats,
we're exposed to all kinds of unfamiliar diseases.
I mean, we're the real so-called zombies, aren't we?
Consuming everything we want without any regard for consequences.
translation.ko: 원하는 뭐든 소비하죠 닥칠 일은 생각지도 않고요

translation.en: As we destroy the Earth so, too, do we destroy ourselves.
So, then, a bat or a monkey?
Maybe.
Anything else we should know? Not that we know anything.
translation.ko: 더 알아야 할 건? 우린 쥐뿔도 모르거든

translation.en: Always keep her fed.
I'm pretty sure we don't want to find out what happens when she's hungry.
translation.ko: 배고프면 무슨 일을 벌일지 알고 싶지도 않네요

translation.en: And if she starts to show more symptoms, like, uh, deterioration or aggression,
translation.ko: 증상이 더 나타나기 시작해서 살이 썩거나 공격적으로 변한다면...

translation.en: you may have to...
What?
Bash her brains in.
We're realtors.
Okay, until we know more, we cannot tell anyone about this,
translation.ko: 더 알아내기 전까진 절대 함구하기로 하자

translation.en: especially your mother.
Although it is hard to imagine how she'd blow this out of proportion.
translation.ko: 상황만 나빠질 게 불 보듯 뻔하니까

translation.en: What a beautiful afternoon.
[gasps] We should do something.
-Let's buy a Range Rover. -Fuck yeah.
translation.ko: 레인지 로버를 사는 거야 완전 좋아!

translation.en: [Joel] No.
We are going home and coming up with a plan.
We need answers.
How'd this happen? How do we fix it?
-Has it affected anyone else? -Ooh!
Look what I found.
-Don't eat a snail. -[Abby] Oh...
-Crunchy. -Okay.
Oh, crap.
Hey, Dan. How was work?
translation.ko: 댄, 왔나? - 일은 어땠어? - 리사 있어?

translation.en: -Lisa home? -[Joel] No, no.
translation.ko: - 일은 어땠어? - 리사 있어? 아니, 곧 오겠지

translation.en: Should be soon, though, I'm guessing.
-Yeah, I don't know her schedule. -What are you all doing here?
translation.ko: 리사 행방을 내가 알 리 있나 다들 여기서 뭐 해?

translation.en: What are you all doing here?
That's funny.
-We were just talking to Eric. -Eric? Why?
translation.ko: 에릭과 얘기 좀 했어 에릭이랑? 왜?

translation.en: Because...
we found a football in our backyard, we thought it might be his.
translation.ko: 뒷마당에서 축구공을 찾았는데 혹시나 에릭 건가 해서

translation.en: Eric doesn't own a football or anything else
that would make him come outside.
That's exactly what he said, only with less implied criticism, so...
translation.ko: 에릭도 그렇게 말하더군 덜 빈정대긴 했지만 결국 공 주인은 못 찾았네

translation.en: mystery not solved.
Then, uh, where's the football?
-Run. -Mm-hmm.
-Don't shoot! Don't shoot! -Shoot her! Shoot her!
translation.ko: - 쏘지 마요! - 나 말고 엄마 쏴요

translation.en: We threw it back over the fence.
So, as you would say, "case closed."
"Shoot her, shoot her." Really?
You would be a terrible partner in a crime spree.
Uh, it's called self-preservation.
And it's an instinct you should be happy I have.
translation.ko: 내가 이런 본능을 가진 걸 다행으로 여겨

translation.en: That is exactly what we don't want.
translation.ko: 저런 식으로 상황이 돌아가면 절대 안 된다고!

translation.en: Now Dan is suspicious.
-What if he asks Eric about it? -Eric won't say anything.
translation.ko: - 에릭한테 물어보면? - 아무 말 안 할걸

translation.en: -How do you know? -Because Eric hates his stepdad.
That's sad, I feel bad Eric has a crappy stepdad.
translation.ko: 참 안됐어 그런 거지 같은 놈이 새아빠라니

translation.en: Maybe we should adopt Eric.
Out of the question.
Look, you need to fight this a little. Be a little less impulsive.
translation.ko: 자기야, 조금만 자제하자 충동적인 행동 좀 줄여

translation.en: I'm hungry.
And there's no hamburger left.
I'll go get you some food, but then we're coming up with a plan.
translation.ko: 먹을 걸 좀 사 올게 다녀와서 대책 세우기야 엄마 잘 지켜

translation.en: -Keep her here. -All right.
translation.ko: 다녀와서 대책 세우기야 엄마 잘 지켜 - 응 - 진짜야, 꼼짝 말고 있어

translation.en: -I'm serious, don't go anywhere. -All right.
translation.ko: - 응 - 진짜야, 꼼짝 말고 있어 알았다니까

translation.en: -Whoo! -[Abby cheering]
You should slow down. I need you to slow down. Please slow down.
translation.ko: 속도 좀 줄여요 제발 그만 좀 밟으세요!

translation.en: Faster, faster, faster!
I got organic, I don't know if that's still important.
Oh. What happened to your hair?
Where's your mom?
-Yes! -[all cheering]
I'm glad you finally decided to join us.
This is fantastic.
From now on, always include me in everything.
I can't believe you just went out and bought yourself a Range Rover.
translation.ko: 레인지 로버를 덜컥 샀다니 믿기지 않아

translation.en: I've been wanting one ever since this morning.
I think it's great. You're my new role model.
Yeah, if we want something, we should have it, damn it. End of story.
translation.ko: 갖고 싶은 게 있으면 가져야지, 안 그래?

translation.en: I'm gonna get some of those Christian Louboutins.
They're fucking expensive, but fuck it.
There's a cute guy at the bar looking at you.
Oh, hello, he is cute. Do you know him?
translation.ko: 어머, 완전 귀엽다 저 남자 알아?

translation.en: Oh. His name is Gary. He just moved here.
translation.ko: 게리라고 이사 온 지 얼마 안 됐어

translation.en: You like him. Are you two gonna bone?
translation.ko: 맘에 드나 본데? - 속살 구경 좀 할 거야? - 리사!

translation.en: -Lisa. -What?
translation.ko: - 속살 구경 좀 할 거야? - 리사! 왜? 하고 싶은 거 참지 말자며

translation.en: We decided we shouldn't deny ourselves things,
translation.ko: 왜? 하고 싶은 거 참지 말자며

translation.en: and boning is a thing.
Sheila, let's go home.
-No, honey, I don't want to. -Yeah.
Come on, let's dance.
Sweetheart, you bought a car, and now you're grinding on the neighbors,
translation.ko: 차를 사질 않나 이젠 이웃들과 부비부비까지

translation.en: and this is not who you are.
Maybe it is.
Maybe it's who I've always wanted to be.
Maybe it's not who you are.
-Honey. -Is there a problem?
translation.ko: - 당신도 본모습을 찾아 - 자기야 무슨 문제 있나요?

translation.en: Oh, God, not you.
Look, Joel, obviously you're upset, but if Sheila doesn't wanna go with you--
translation.ko: 기분 상한 건 알겠지만 쉴라는 안 가겠다잖아요

translation.en: Shut up, Gary.
-Sheila-- -Life should be fun, honey.
And I don't care what Consumer Reports says, that car is hot.
She wants to have fun, Joel.
And doesn't care what Consumer Reports says. I heard her, Gary.
translation.ko: '컨슈머 리포트'도 신경 안 쓴댔죠 나 귀 안 먹었거든요? 쉴라

translation.en: -Sheila? -Then maybe you should go.
You know, 15 years ago, I would have punched you, once.
translation.ko: 15년 전이면 주먹을 날렸을걸 딱 한 방이지

translation.en: I might have dropped you.
If not, you would have beaten the hell out of me,
'cause I just had the one move, and you're a substantial man.
translation.ko: 난 결정적인 한 방뿐이고 당신은 한 덩치 하니까

translation.en: But now I have a family, a career, a life.
translation.ko: 하지만 이젠 지켜야 할 가정과 직업과 인생이 있으니

translation.en: I'm not gonna be the guy who gets into bar fights.
-You mean loses bar fights. -You're missing my point.
translation.ko: 치고받다 지는 거 말이죠? 요점을 못 알아듣는군

translation.en: You don't wanna get into a fight because you're afraid you might lose.
That is exactly wrong.
-The losing is a given. -Damn straight.
-And it's irrelevant. -You mean inevitable.
translation.ko: - 그건 핵심이 아니라고 - 질 게 뻔하다 이거죠

translation.en: Goddamn it, you're frustrating.
At this point in my life,
translation.ko: 이만큼 인생을 살았으면 술집에서 싸워 봤자...

translation.en: -I'm not gonna be the kind of person-- -Who wins a bar fight.
translation.ko: 이만큼 인생을 살았으면 술집에서 싸워 봤자... - 못 이긴다는 거잖아요 - 망할 자식! 뭐가 문제야?

translation.en: -God fuck, what's the matter with you? -You are.
translation.ko: - 못 이긴다는 거잖아요 - 망할 자식! 뭐가 문제야? 당신이 문제지

translation.en: I'm trying to explain a very simple concept.
You are.
I'm just gonna call this a draw and go home.
translation.ko: 그냥 비긴 거로 치고 퇴장해 드리지

translation.en: Have fun.
Joel, come back.
Hey, I'm sorry for butting in.
I just don't like seeing a woman treated badly.
translation.ko: 여자를 그렇게 다루는 건 못 참겠더라고요

translation.en: -It's not gonna work. -No? Really? How about this?
translation.ko: - 그딴 수법 안 통해요 - 그래요? 이러면요?

translation.en: Oh, my.
You happy now, big man?
You are.
My manager noticed that you've been staring at the toaster ovens
translation.ko: 오븐 토스터만 백만 년째 보고 계신다고

translation.en: for, like, a really long-- Oh, it's you.
Hey, do you know which one of these has a knob without any slack?
No. Does it matter?
[sighs] I thought so.
translation.ko: 중요한 줄 알았죠 그런 줄 알았는데

translation.en: I really did, but maybe it doesn't.
translation.ko: 중요한 줄 알았죠 그런 줄 알았는데 안 중요한가 봐요

translation.en: Maybe I shouldn't care about toaster knobs,
or being responsible, or descending into chaos.
translation.ko: 토스터 손잡이든 가장의 책임감이든 일이 꼬이든 말든 신경 끄면 그만인데

translation.en: Why should I be the only one in my family who gives a crap, right?
Who sucks it up?
This one's cheaper.
Maybe I want to have fun, drive a fancy car,
translation.ko: 누군 안 놀고 싶나? 비싼 차 몰고 싶고 발정 난 듯 춤추고 싶다고요

translation.en: dance like a sex lunatic, hmm?
translation.ko: 비싼 차 몰고 싶고 발정 난 듯 춤추고 싶다고요

translation.en: -You're a good dancer. -You're missing the point, Ramona.
I don't want to dance.
And I don't want another shitty toaster oven.
translation.ko: 거지 같은 오븐 토스터도 다신 안 사요

translation.en: I'm outta here.
Hi.
Gary.
I rang the bell then I saw your car in the driveway, so...
translation.ko: 초인종 눌렀다가 차가 주차돼 있길래 왔어요

translation.en: I'm just gardening. It relaxes me.
What's up?
I just wanted to make sure you were all right.
Because I didn't wanna have sex with you last night?
I'm fine.
We were in the middle of dancing and then you just strolled off.
I had a lot on my mind.
I ended up walking around all night.
Checked out a Dumpster behind Chili's.
They throw away a lot of raw meat.
-How about we start over? -I don't think so.
-Are you sure? -I am.
Are you?
I feel like whatever I say
is just going to mean you push harder against my vagina.
translation.ko: 더 세게 들이대면 된다고 생각하나 봐요

translation.en: Okay, I was right.
-Listen, Gary-- -Shh...
How about this?
We have some fun. You said you're all about fun.
translation.ko: 우리 재미 좀 봅시다 재밌게 살고 싶댔죠?

translation.en: And I don't say anything to your lame husband.
Or we don't, and I tell him we screwed four times last night in my beamer.
translation.ko: 내 말대로 안 하면 어제 내 차에서 네 번은 했다고 전하겠어요

translation.en: Your unwillingness to take no for an answer
has made me feel sexy and desirable.
translation.ko: 내가 더 쌔끈하고 매력적인 것처럼 느껴지네요

translation.en: I know, weirdest foreplay ever.
You ate my fingers.
-I do not hate your fingers. -"Ate," ate my fingers.
translation.ko: 당신 손가락 극혐 아닌데요? 꿀꺽했다고! 내 손가락을 먹다니

translation.en: Sheila?
Sheila, we need to talk.
Last night was bullshit.
Sheila!
Sheil-- [gasps]
Oh, Joel.
I really want to make this work.
♪ I walked for miles Oh, with my head in my hand ♪
